titles.title: To prohibit use of education funds to make condoms available in an elementary school.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Elementary, Secondary and Vocational Education.

bill.summary: 10/7/1994--Introduced. Prohibits use of any funds made available under the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to make condoms available in an elementary school.
